readable.title: 2707873672_15e6b5d54b
readable.content: Two boys wearing brown shirts tug at a rope on a wooden platform . Two boys with red hair and glasses stand on a table and fight . Two redheaded boys in brown shirts stand on a table and are fighting with sticks . Two redheaded boys with glasses stand on bench , play swordfight with sticks . Two twin pre-teen boys dueling with sticks
